0BE.F.summary: Dovre Group Plc, together with its subsidiaries, provides project management services worldwide. It operates in two segments, Project Personnel and Consulting. The Project Personnel segment offers project personnel services for various investment projects. The Consulting segment provides management and project management consulting and software for enterprise level management in Nordic countries. The company serves private companies and public organizations in energy, mining, pulp and paper, and building infrastructure industries. It also offers project advisory services. The company was formerly known as Proha Plc and changed its name to Dovre Group Plc in March 2011. Dovre Group Plc was founded in 1983 and is in Espoo, Finland.

RO3.F.summary: Robit Oyj manufactures and sells drilling consumables for applications in mining, construction and contracting, tunneling, and well drilling industries. It operates through three business units: Top Hammer, Down the Hole (DTH), and Digital Services. The company offers top hammer drill strings for underground drifting, bolting, and long hole drilling; DTH hammers, bits, tubes, and rotary heads for surface mining; DTH hammers and bits, and locked casing systems for tough ground conditions; top hammer bench and underground drilling tools; and top hammer drill strings for face drilling and forepoling, as well as for bolting and roof support. It also provides reverse circulation products; and digital technologies comprising the unique drill hole measurement technology under the Robit Sense Systems brand. The company operates in Europe, the Middle East, Africa, North and South America, Asia, Australasia, Russia, and CIS countries. Robit Oyj was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in LempÃ¤Ã¤lÃ¤, Finland.
